name: Ryan Pangle
text: I have to give it to you guys and gals. üëèüëè This was really, really good grub. I was very pleased to see everything being freshly-made and prepared right in front of my eyes. The pizza pie only takes a few minutes to bake (in actual fire ‚Ä¶More

name: Danielle Stenhjem
text: Omg so good! Best toppings! Such a great variety - from broccoli to garlic to artichokes, yum! The sauce choices are delicious too - I like to mix the red sauce with the garlic pesto.

name: S Osborn
text: Great place for delicious pizza. Nice place to meet and catch up with family. The service was very helpful and welcoming. Bring your hunger - portions are generous.

name: Helen Foster
text: Driving thru Fargo and needed a quick meal. This pizza is awesome. The crust had a great flavor and texture. The garlic pesto sauce was delicious. Definitely will stop off at again next time in town.

name: Ismael Ortega
text: I love going to Blaze. Their pizzas are always delicious. Not too flat like some places and not too thick, just enough to fold them if you have to. Ingredients are delicious and if you don't like the menu items you can always mix and match! ‚Ä¶More

name: Britt Leimer
text: Absolutely the best place in Fargo to get a vegan pizza. It's fast, affordable, the crust is amazing (cauliflower crust is not vegan so I got the regular. The double large reg crust is soooo high in calories but it's soooo good.) and they ‚Ä¶More

name: Laura Lawrence
text: Very good pizza and love the blood orange lemonade. Very courteous and efficient staff.

name: Lori Zarling
text: Called and asked if I could do a pickup at 8:45 pm as we were traveling through Fargo and could not get there until then. I spoke with Aaron and was advised the latest was 8:30. Super disappointed Blaze!  Your menu looked awesome and we ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason Alderman
text: My favorite worker quit she was always nice and the hardest worker there the food just doesn't taste as good without her

name: Joel Weiss
text: Amazing pizzas and great beverages. Who knew Blackberry Basil would taste so good!

name: Ashley
text: I'm a pizza lover, but Blaze Pizza takes the pie! I can tell they use fresh ingredients and I love the Keto pizza option. They are certainly my family's new go-to pizza place. We just downloaded their mobile app which makes things even easier and now we get rewards for the food we already enjoy!

name: Savannah Ward
text: Favorite pizza place in FM. Vegan and vegetarian friendly!

name: Garrett M
text: Always friendly staff and the wait is very minimal. The food is always delicious. Staff frequently disinfect commonly touched areas and are courteous. AND THEY HAVE VEGAN OPTIONS! The chorizo is vegan and they also have vegan cheese!

name: Julia Randolph
text: First time ordering from Blaze. I order the gluten free crust which was probably the best gluten free pizza crust I've had. The vegan cheese isn't great, but I haven't found a dairy free cheese that is, so I don't blame Blaze for that. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Chad Severtson
text: We ordered our pizzas at 5:40 pm. Delivery was estimated at 6:12 pm. At 6:30 we tried to call the store and were disconnected every time. The automated phone system repeatedly discourages you from trying to talk to the store directly. Tried ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher Lau
text: No shortage of options, crust is great and the speed is great with kids. In and out without them losing their minds on waits. Great place.

name: Brad Sellinger
text: Good new pizza place. The staff was friendly and did a good job of explaining the way things work. They have a good selection of pizzas and you can build your own pizza too. All for the same affordable price. The pizza came out quick...so quick that I was skeptical...but I was sold. Cooked just right. I will return.

name: Fitri G
text: The service was friendly and the pizza was delicious.  What's not to like? (Don't add double garlic or your tummy will pay for it, that was my mistake.  I should have taken the hint when the lady was like "so you want fresh AND roasted garlic?'...never again.)

name: Trina Beninati
text: Really like the concept of pay 1 price for unlimited toppings or the fact that they also had pre-determined topping choices too for the indecisive person. I did the create your own, all toppings were fresh and pizza was done perfectly. Had ‚Ä¶More

name: Jerry Standifer
text: Love Blaze!  Any place that let's me put as many toppings on my pizza for one price is my kind of place!  I love the oven fired taste and the staff are typically very helpful.

name: Wyatt Johnson
text: Love the signature pizzas, try the Hot Link!

name: Sara Bush
text: Good visit to a new place in Fargo. Enjoyed the pizza, and we had good service helping us since we haven't been here before. Enjoyed the original crust the best. The sauce and crust was amz. Had great toppings as well. We enjoyed a 2 ‚Ä¶More

name: Tom and Carol Hedberg
text: Pizza was good but my order was not exactly correct. The chocolate chip cookies are wonderful.

name: Matthew Thompson
text: Ymmmm so many choices , all fresh , I had the cauliflower crust if that gives you and idea of choices . Lots of fresh ideas

name: Kathryn Harvey
text: One of the best pizzas I've had outside of Italy.  The Fargo Pale Ale was perfect with the Red Vine Pizza.

name: Sonu Sharma
text: Best pizza place in Fargo. You can customize your pizza the way you like it and the best part it gets ready quickly. Cannot wait to go there again :-)

name: Seyedali Hosseinirad
text: It was the worst Pizza I ever had. The bread was burned and the toppings were raw.

name: Sadie Keaveny
text: Fresh and fast. Different drink choices, many pizza combos and well designed environment.

name: Terese Rollins
text: Love this place! Best pizza i have ever had!

name: Rachel
text: Good food, quick service, friendly staff. Chevk 'em out!

name: Jaden Wirrenga
text: This is my go to pizza place in Fargo and I am a pizza addict. Price is good for unlimited toppings, but I usually only use 2-3 so I usually get the 2 topping build your own now to save some money.

name: Slate CHSThrower
text: Best build your own pizza in Fargo!

name: Shelby Wagemakers
text: Tasty, fast pizza! Really nice thin, crispy crust and quality cheese and toppings.

name: TEE Bros Sieng
text: This is one of my favorite pizza places in Fargo! The staff is super great--so friendly and positive.  Heather, in particular, helped me figure out the online ordering system and was so kind when I messed it up! üòÖ The pizza itself is delicious and all the ingredients are so fresh! Thanks Heather! Even my toddler loves this pizza!

name: PK
text: I like the pizza very much. It tasted great and fresh. I had tried balze pizza back in LA and was excited that they were opening up here in Fargo. Was completely satisfied.

name: Abby Braaten
text: Delicious, budget friendly, and so customizable! Great place to go for a date or just to grab lunch. I enjoyed their pre-made pizza ideas while the person I was with did a create your own. A perk of the create your own is that there is NO ‚Ä¶More

text: I love the price and the taste. I get to add anything I want and have my own custom pizza. Pizza is always constantly good and just the right thickness. Personal preference but would recommend

name: Gibby L
text: Ordered here for the first time and very disappointed. I ordered a hawain pizza and it was so undercooked that when you picked it up the toppings slid off the slice and it was extremely greasy and did not taste good.  The garlic knots were also undercooked. Waste of money.

name: Toby Mulvihill
text: Great fare, hip joint, Quick Service (3 mins for food in my hands), fun teamwork to watch at the pass, domestic and local beer with wine choices, delicious flavors, not overly filling with density. I would definitely be here more often if I lived in this region of Fargo.

name: ray ban
text: The staff are always a great reason to stop in, and the Pi-Day coupon was certainly a bonus!  Took my build-my-own home and enjoyed.  Pizza was excellent!

name: Loni Muus
text: Great food. I love their vegan cheese, it's great tasting and you would never know the difference. Super cheap, as well.

name: Michelle Tamayo
text: I have to say the food was great but what really sold me was the staff. Everyone was so kind and the manager did walk throughs to see if our food was good. Definitely recommend a visit

name: Julie Cabinaw
text: Blaze is my favorite pizza place, hands down. I always get the high rise crust with ham, artichokes, garlic, spinach and arugula and mix the red and white sauces. It‚Äôs heavenly! And always some to take home. Kids love that they can get exactly what they want, how they want it! I do too!!

name: Kathleen Keene
text: They have vegan cheese and soy chorizo! Not to mention amazing fresh, all-natural gourmet toppings, and Blue Sky soda and agua fresca on tap!

name: Cynthia O'Hara
text: The pizza was delicious. I brought half home, finished it up before going to bed.

name: Tyler S
text: Great date experience, refreshing atmosphere, tasty food, fun options, and budget friendly. We enjoyed it and will return.

name: Christa Flores
text: Great food and super fast service...even on Pi Day!!

name: Tryston Simek
text: Love eating here. It is basically a Subway for pizza, but way better. The pizza is made in a woodfire oven and is very delicious. Definitely one of my favourite places to eat.

name: K

name: Ron Capistran
text: My wife swears they have the best gluten free pizzas in that RRV!! As for me , I love gluten and the pizzas and service are great. Nice place!! Nice people.

name: Joan E Eastlund

name: Kristy Tran
text: They‚Äôre always so welcoming and the food is amazing! I love how they use fresh ingredients and that it‚Äôs made right in front of you! One of the best pizza joints in Fargo for sure!

text: There are not a lot of places with Keto meal options. Blaze is one of them. The Keto pizza crust is pretty good. I'll have to try it again.

name: Michael Place

text: Blaze is a place with great customer service, and amazing food. There hasn‚Äôt been a time I have gone into the restaurant and not felt welcome. The staff is so friendly and always helpful. The building in general is always clean super clean. 5 OUT OF 5 and nothing less.

name: Jameson Coltor
text: Delicious wood-fired pizza. I stopped by for the first time today after hearing excellent reviews. Pizza was fresh, establishment was clean, and the kids loved it. The staff are very friendly, and our pizza creator Paige was helpful and quick. I will be returning.

text: Fun build your own pizza place but both the original crust and original sauce are a bit plain.

text: Very fun experience! Pizza is made from scratch right in front of you. Pizza is then "Fast Fired" in a brick fire oven. Extremely tasty and very fresh. Restaurant is very clean and well designed.

text: Been here a few times has not ever disappointed. Tried the Keto crust this last time not expecting it to be great, however it makes a really tasty base. I feel you cant go wrong here.

name: Matt Tompkins
text: Great pizza! Fast, fresh and tasty. We appreciated the variety of options and the speedy courteous service.

name: Rob Burke
text: One of our favorite pizza places in town, they do a great job of making your experience welcoming and not feel like a fast food joint even though it technically is. Our favorite, the margarita pizza!

name: brent dek
text: A simple pie is all anyone really needs!

name: Christopher Samuels

text: Mixed feelings. Best, fast pizza that I've enjoyed l inspite of this being the location where I learned that my grandfather had passed, via phonecall. This doesn't account for the missing star. Their service and quality have dropped 10-20% since opening a couple years back.

text: Just tried them for the first time. I follow a ketogenic diet and wanted to see how their keto crust compares to mine and I must say I'm impressed. It's very close to a regular pizza crust... so close that I actually feel like I'm cheating... lol

text: Great pizza, salad, and cookies.  Fast and friendly service.

name: Amanda Brown

text: Good food. Get to make your pizza like you would a sandwich at Subway! Blaze let's you have it your way. Friendly place in town.

text: Hosted a fundraiser for our colleges pride alliance. Food was great, service was very kind and helpful, it was nice and clean inside and all the staff seemed genuinely happy. Also the pizza took less than five minuets.

name: Kimberly Flamm

name: heather mccord
text: Staff was super friendly, helpful, and went the extra mile. All of them from the initial pizza/salad makers, to the chef, to the clean up staff, all were wonderful. It was a great experience all around. Food was fresh and delish.

name: Crystal Casto
text: Love this place. Pizza is amazing. Prices are great. Staff are courteous and friendly. I have driven from Detroit Lakes to Fargo just for Blaze pizza, it's that good. We  need one in Detroit Lakes.

name: Elli Feist
text: We've never had a bad experience in all the times that we have been here. Employees are extremely friendly and provide outstanding service. Food is delicious and fresh. Absolutely love this place. Best pizza in town, hands down üòÅü§ó can't wait to try the patio this summer!!!

text: Blaze pizza is very good. It was very busy when we went and service was still quick. The serving size was very generous considering the price paid, and the quality was very high as well. The restaurant was modern and clean. Overall a fantastic experience.

name: Alyssa Severson
text: Your pizza, your way at a GREAT price.

text: Some of the best pizza I ever had. Created my own & ate every bite. Sea salt chocolate chip cookie was amazing too.

text: Pizza is super good. Staff has been increasingly rude each time I‚Äôve been here.

text: Very friendly staff.  Took about 10 minutes from beginning my order to having a homemade pizza.  Pizza crust is thin and chewy (in a good way).  It is well priced too.  I will be back here again and will bring more people!

text: Had Link In pizza.   Was very good pizza.   Like the way  you can order your pizza.  Price was reasonable.  Would definitely go again to try other kinds of pizzas.

name: Frank LaLonde
text: Great pizzas. Usually great service. Had a minor issue with one person who had difficulty reading the ingredient list for my pizza. Practically had his nose in my pizza. You come into the store, order either a custom pizza or off the menu. ‚Ä¶More

text: The person who is the one to take your order ( the first who writte your name) she is super  rude, disrespectful to customers.

text: Loved this place, great service, affordable price, and the thin crust pizza is cooked excellent and isn't crunchy. The main reason for why it's three stars is because of getting sick after having a pizza there about a month ago  Never happened before. I want to eat there again, but this incident makes me hesitant.
